overview: On the day of his daughter's wedding, a good-natured construction worker (Henry Armetta) is suspected by his wife of being involved with another woman, wrongly implicates his company's boss as a racketeer, and is arrested by police for running a shakedown operation. Comedy.
tagline: He was 'CAUGHT IN THE ACT" and couldn't explain---so he spent the night in jail!
title: Caught in the Act
